import React, { useState } from "react"; import { IoIosArrowDown } from "react-icons/io"; import { discountCalc } from "../api/List"; import { RxCross1 } from "react-icons/rx"; // import { SizeModal } from "../components/SizeModal"; import Modal from "react-modal"; export const CartItem = ({ product }) => { const [modalOpen, setModalOpen] = useState(false); return ( <>
{product.name}

Category: {product.category}

₹{product.price} {product.oldPrice && ( <> ₹{product.oldPrice} ({discountCalc(product.oldPrice, product.price)}% OFF) )}
{ setModalOpen(true); }} className="cursor-pointer flex items-center justify-center w-fit gap-1 mt-2 px-2 py-1 bg-gray-100 font-semibold rounded-sm text-xs" > Size: {product.size.toUpperCase()}{" "} Qty: {product.qty}{" "}
{/* */}
setModalOpen(false)} className="absolute rounded w-fit h-fit bg-[#f1f1f1] p-6 left-0 right-0 mx-auto top-1/2 -translate-y-1/2" overlayClassName="bg-[#0000007c] fixed inset-0 z-50" >
{product.name} {product.category.charAt(0).toUpperCase() + product.category.slice(1)}
₹{product.price} {product.oldPrice && ( <> ₹{product.oldPrice} ({discountCalc(product.oldPrice, product.price)}% OFF) )}

Select size

); };
